===Floor 12===
* '''Ley Line Disorder'''
** For this floor only, the ley line flow will be normal.
* '''Additional Effects'''
** In Chamber 1's First Half, there is a {{Cryo}} [[Elemental Node]] that applies a massive resistance and defense buff to enemy units until the status has been removed with {{Pyro}}.
** In Chamber 1's Second Half, there is an {{Electro}} Elemental Node that applies a massive resistance and cooldown buff to enemy units until the status has been removed with {{Pyro}} or {{Cryo}}.
** In Chamber 3's First Half, the Mirror Maiden is empowered with the '''Slowing Water''' ({{Hydro}}) Aura.
